Description.Details: In an attempt to Improve the Combat Profile of LBX AutoCannons RISC Engineers created a completely new HE Shell. It causes massive explosion around the Impact. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: LBX2 AOE Ammo
